name: Rotating Opera
description:
Hello, this is a game developer from China! 

I am a member of Moon Cluster Studio, which is a student group which contains students  who love game and want to make interesting games. Our gained happiness from game and we also   want to use game to share our joy.

If you like our game and want to know about the plot, please comment our game. We will make a translating function (Just Chinese and English ... ) if there are about 20 non-Chinese Speakers want to play English version .

关于作者：

大家好，这里是来自福州大学月光簇工作室的游戏开发者，月光簇是一个由热爱游戏，并且希望制作出有趣游戏的工作室。

这是我们团队参与的2021网易MG大赛的项目，名叫翻转剧场。 本次的网易主题是“戏”，而我们最终的想法是剧场2333

如果大家喜欢我们的游戏，希望大家能够前往网易MG作品展示-翻转剧场投个票吧。我们希望收到的票是大家真心我们游戏才投的，希望不要有拉票行为呀谢谢啦。
